se.swedenconnect.opensaml.xmlsec

Class BasicExtendedEncryptionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensaml.xmlsec.impl.BasicWhitelistBlacklistConfiguration
      • org.opensaml.xmlsec.impl.BasicEncryptionConfiguration
        • se.swedenconnect.opensaml.xmlsec.BasicExtendedEncryptionConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncryptionConfiguration, WhitelistBlacklistConfiguration, ExtendedEncryptionConfiguration

    public class BasicExtendedEncryptionConfiguration
extends BasicEncryptionConfiguration
implements ExtendedEncryptionConfiguration
    Extends OpenSAML's BasicEncryptionConfiguration so that we implement the ExtendedEncryptionConfiguration interface.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyAgreementCredentials

        @Nonnull
 @NonnullElements
 @Unmodifiable
 @NotLive
public List<Credential> getKeyAgreementCredentials()
        Get the list of key agreement credentials to use, in preference order.

        A key agreement credential is typically the peer public key that may be used in a key agreement protocol to generate a key encryption/wrapping key.

        Specified by:
        getKeyAgreementCredentials in interface ExtendedEncryptionConfiguration
        Returns:
        the list of key agreement credentials, may be empty

      • setKeyAgreementCredentials

        public void setKeyAgreementCredentials(@Nullable
                                       List<Credential> keyAgreementCredentials)
        Sets the key agreement credentials to use.

        A key agreement credential is typically the peer public key that may be used in a key agreement protocol to generate a key encryption/wrapping key.

        Parameters:
        keyAgreementCredentials - the list of key transport agreement credentials
